Package neqsim.fluidmechanics.flownode

Class HeatTransferCoefficientCalculator

java.lang.Object
neqsim.fluidmechanics.flownode.HeatTransferCoefficientCalculator
public class HeatTransferCoefficientCalculator extends Object
Utility class for calculating heat transfer coefficients in two-phase pipe flow.

Implements flow pattern-specific Nusselt number correlations for calculating interphase and wall heat transfer coefficients. The correlations are based on well-established literature sources.

Correlations by Flow Pattern:

  • Stratified: Nu = f(Re, Pr, geometry) - Solbraa (2002)
  • Annular: Nu = f(Re_film, Pr, wave amplitude) - Hewitt & Hall-Taylor
  • Slug: Nu_bubble + Nu_slug weighted - Fernandes et al.
  • Bubble: Nu = 2 + 0.6·Re^0.5·Pr^0.33 - Ranz-Marshall
  • Droplet: Nu = 2 + 0.6·Re^0.5·Pr^0.33 - Ranz-Marshall
Version:
1.0
Author:
ASMF

  • Method Details

    • calculateLiquidHeatTransferCoefficient

      public static double calculateLiquidHeatTransferCoefficient(FlowPattern flowPattern, double diameter, double liquidHoldup, double usg, double usl, double rhoL, double muL, double cpL, double kL)
      Calculates the liquid-side interphase heat transfer coefficient.
      Parameters:
      flowPattern - the flow pattern
      diameter - pipe diameter (m)
      liquidHoldup - liquid holdup
      usg - superficial gas velocity (m/s)
      usl - superficial liquid velocity (m/s)
      rhoL - liquid density (kg/m³)
      muL - liquid viscosity (Pa·s)
      cpL - liquid heat capacity (J/(kg·K))
      kL - liquid thermal conductivity (W/(m·K))
      Returns:
      liquid-side heat transfer coefficient h_L (W/(m²·K)), always non-negative

    • calculateGasHeatTransferCoefficient

      public static double calculateGasHeatTransferCoefficient(FlowPattern flowPattern, double diameter, double liquidHoldup, double usg, double rhoG, double muG, double cpG, double kG)
      Calculates the gas-side interphase heat transfer coefficient.
      Parameters:
      flowPattern - the flow pattern
      diameter - pipe diameter (m)
      liquidHoldup - liquid holdup
      usg - superficial gas velocity (m/s)
      rhoG - gas density (kg/m³)
      muG - gas viscosity (Pa·s)
      cpG - gas heat capacity (J/(kg·K))
      kG - gas thermal conductivity (W/(m·K))
      Returns:
      gas-side heat transfer coefficient h_G (W/(m²·K)), always non-negative

    • calculateOverallInterphaseCoefficient

      public static double calculateOverallInterphaseCoefficient(double hL, double hG)
      Calculates the overall interphase heat transfer coefficient using resistance in series model. 
       1/U_interphase = 1/h_L + 1/h_G
      Parameters:
      hL - liquid-side heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))
      hG - gas-side heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))
      Returns:
      overall interphase heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))

    • calculateDittusBoelterNusselt

      public static double calculateDittusBoelterNusselt(double re, double pr, boolean heating)
      Calculates Nusselt number using the Dittus-Boelter correlation for turbulent flow. 
       Nu = 0.023 · Re^0.8 · Pr^n
 where n = 0.4 for heating (fluid being heated)
       n = 0.3 for cooling (fluid being cooled)
      Parameters:
      re - Reynolds number
      pr - Prandtl number
      heating - true if fluid is being heated, false if being cooled
      Returns:
      Nusselt number

    • calculateLaminarNusselt

      public static double calculateLaminarNusselt(boolean constantWallTemp)
      Calculates Nusselt number for laminar flow in a pipe.

      For fully developed laminar flow with constant wall temperature: Nu = 3.66 For constant heat flux: Nu = 4.36

      Parameters:
      constantWallTemp - true for constant wall temperature, false for constant heat flux
      Returns:
      Nusselt number

    • calculateGnielinskiNusselt

      public static double calculateGnielinskiNusselt(double re, double pr, double frictionFactor)
      Calculates Nusselt number using Gnielinski correlation for transitional and turbulent flow. 
       Nu = (f/8)(Re-1000)Pr / [1 + 12.7(f/8)^0.5(Pr^(2/3) - 1)]
 Valid for: 3000 < Re < 5×10^6, 0.5 < Pr < 2000
      Parameters:
      re - Reynolds number
      pr - Prandtl number
      frictionFactor - Darcy friction factor
      Returns:
      Nusselt number

    • calculateCondensationNusselt

      public static double calculateCondensationNusselt(double rhoL, double rhoG, double hfg, double length, double muL, double kL, double deltaT)
      Calculates Nusselt number for condensation on a vertical surface (Nusselt theory). 
       Nu = 0.943 · [ρ_L(ρ_L-ρ_G)g·h_fg·L³ / (μ_L·k_L·ΔT)]^0.25
      Parameters:
      rhoL - liquid density (kg/m³)
      rhoG - gas density (kg/m³)
      hfg - latent heat of vaporization (J/kg)
      length - characteristic length (m)
      muL - liquid viscosity (Pa·s)
      kL - liquid thermal conductivity (W/(m·K))
      deltaT - temperature difference (K)
      Returns:
      Nusselt number

    • calculateStantonNumber

      public static double calculateStantonNumber(double h, double rho, double u, double cp)
      Calculates the Stanton number for heat transfer. 
       St = h / (ρ · u · Cp) = Nu / (Re · Pr)
      Parameters:
      h - heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))
      rho - density (kg/m³)
      u - velocity (m/s)
      cp - heat capacity (J/(kg·K))
      Returns:
      Stanton number (dimensionless)

    • calculateCondensationHTC

      public static double calculateCondensationHTC(double rhoL, double rhoG, double kL, double hfg, double cpL, double muL, double diameter, double deltaT)
      Estimates the condensation heat transfer coefficient using the Chato correlation for horizontal tube condensation. 
       h = 0.555 · [g·ρ_L(ρ_L-ρ_G)·k_L³·h_fg' / (μ_L·D·ΔT)]^0.25
 where h_fg' = h_fg + 0.68·cp_L·ΔT (modified latent heat)
      Parameters:
      rhoL - liquid density (kg/m³)
      rhoG - gas density (kg/m³)
      kL - liquid thermal conductivity (W/(m·K))
      hfg - latent heat of vaporization (J/kg)
      cpL - liquid heat capacity (J/(kg·K))
      muL - liquid viscosity (Pa·s)
      diameter - tube diameter (m)
      deltaT - temperature difference between saturation and wall (K)
      Returns:
      condensation heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))

    • calculateEvaporationHTC

      public static double calculateEvaporationHTC(double rhoL, double rhoG, double cpL, double hfg, double sigma, double muL, double prL, double qFlux)
      Estimates the evaporation heat transfer coefficient for nucleate pool boiling using the Rohsenow correlation.
      Parameters:
      rhoL - liquid density (kg/m³)
      rhoG - gas density (kg/m³)
      cpL - liquid heat capacity (J/(kg·K))
      hfg - latent heat of vaporization (J/kg)
      sigma - surface tension (N/m)
      muL - liquid viscosity (Pa·s)
      prL - liquid Prandtl number
      qFlux - heat flux (W/m²)
      Returns:
      evaporation heat transfer coefficient (W/(m²·K))
